Class SimpleIO

public class SimpleIO
extends java.lang.Object

Provides prompt and readLine methods for console input

Constructor Summary

Method Summary
static void prompt(java.lang.String s)
          Displays the string s without terminating the current line
static java.lang.String readLine()
          Reads and returns a single line of input entered by the user; terminates the program if an exception is thrown
